content:
# I have successfully crafted one Iron Gear Wheel, and my inventory now contains 1 Iron Gear Wheel along with 2 Iron Plates, 5 Coal, and 5 Stone.
# Now, I can craft the Inserter, which requires 1 Iron Plate and 1 Iron Gear Wheel.

# Since I have both the required materials, I will proceed to craft the Inserter.
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerInserter, quantity=1)  # Craft one Burner Inserter.
print(f'Updated Inventory after crafting inserter: {inspect_inventory()}')  # Check the inventory after crafting.
